word:
Chap. 2 - The Huntsville School
-

   From article published in "Review and Herald," 1904.) 
                                                                -
 


     Monday morning, July 20, 1904, I went from Graysville to Huntsville. We found the school situated in a beautiful country place. In the school farm there are more than three hundred acres of land, a large part of which is under cultivation.
